entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or thunderstorms. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers or thunderstorms beginning in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming south 20 near noon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
